messages.title: Building a stronger economy and a fairer society. Creating opportunity for everyone.
messages.content: Dominic Graham and the Liberal Democrats are creating opportunity for everyone, by building a stronger economy and a fairer society.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: The Liberal Democrats plan to cut Income Tax by an additional £400 for every worker.
They aim to protect education spending from cradle to college.
They guarantee mental health equality by increasing health spending by £8bn a year.

mentions.candidate: Dominic Graham, Liberal Democrat candidate, is featured throughout the leaflet.
mentions.otherPartyLeaderCandidate: There are implicit references to Conservative candidates and leaders through comparison of policies and electoral strategies.
mentions.partyLeader: Nick Clegg is pictured with Dominic Graham.
mentions.tacticalSituation: The leaflet notes that the choice to beat the Tories in Harwich and North Essex is Dominic Graham, indicative of tactical voting considerations.

issues.economy: The leaflet discusses the Liberal Democrats' role in cutting the deficit and building a stronger economy.
issues.education: The Liberal Democrats promise an extra £2.5bn a year for struggling school kids.
issues.health: Liberal Democrats plan to deliver 6,000 more doctors, highlighting their past record in increasing health budget.

leaflet.personalStatement: Dominic Graham is an experienced Local Councillor and is passionate about law and justice being there for us all, not just for those who can afford it.

politicalExperience.achievements: Has experience as a Local Councillor, implying a record of getting things done.

contactInformation.address: Return to: Rosemary Smith, Lib Dems, 26 New Rd. Mistley CO11 2AQ

images.caption: Dominic Graham with Nick Clegg visiting Colchester Hospital's Mental Health Department.
Dominic Graham's Past Delivery and Future Promises.
Dominic Graham - The choice to beat the Tories here.
Dominic Graham - Liberal Democrat candidate for Harwich and North Essex.

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet emphasizes a tactical choice for the voters, suggesting that voting for Dominic Graham is the strategic choice to beat the Conservative party in the constituency.
